JobFullDesc: Senior Experienced Recruiting Specialist Seeking an experienced recruiting professional who can deliver a high-touch, personalized candidate experience across Deloitte. Looking for a strategic, innovative professional who is progressive and can lead from the front by being authentic, agile, connected and technologically bold in all areas of recruiting.  Work you'll do  Experienced recruiting focuses on aligning candidates who bring previous knowledge and expertise to expanding the business practices.  Serve as the subject matter expert and primary point of contact for candidates and the business  Serve as an advisor to the business and a leader among peers  Provide guidance to internal stakeholders in designing a tailored recruiting approach to achieve demand  Leverage recruiting expertise to influence key internal stakeholders on highly complex decisions regarding the direction or operation of recruitment activities, programs or a function  Determine objectives and approaches to assignments with considerable latitude and often with minimal precedent  Serve as a "Brand Ambassador" to expand our internal & external footprint to build the Distinctively Deloitte brand  The team  The Talent Acquisition team sits within our Talent Operations organization and collaborates with the business and across the Talent organization to provide strategic insight into the recruiting vision. The team advises on, implements and executes the recruiting strategy, providing full-lifecycle recruitment recruiting services. Teams are aligned by business function and then by type of hire, campus, experienced and Partner/Principal/Managing Director recruiting.  Qualifications  Required:  Bachelor's Degree or equivalent  Minimum 3 years related recruiting experience  Experience with recruiting in a professional services firm  Experience with multiple interview channels, including video.  Experience various technologies including Microsoft Office and applicant tracking system, including, but not limited to Taleo, Salesforce, or Avature  Preferred:  Experience working with a Consulting-focused business.  Proven ability to work effectively in a dynamic, fast-paced, multi-tasking environment  Ability to quickly acquire a strong understanding of relevant firm businesses, recruiting policies, procedures, and systems and educate colleagues and clients  Consultative approach toward clients with proven ability to influence others and build strong relationships  Ability to embrace technology platforms, lead and advise teams and clients in participating in our social media strategy across Deloitte businesses.  Demonstrate a willingness to step outside of comfort zone and develop new methodologies and approaches in the spirit of experimentation and innovation  Analytical with advanced problem-solving skills
